components.name: Storage and Backups || Cloud Disk Array

incident_updates.body:
All the equipment is now replaced.
he public network is back on the rack T05H09 at 08h45 UTC.
We are monitoring the situation

The intervention has begun.
The rack T05H09 has lost its public network at 08h08 UTC.
We will post a new update once the intervention is finished

We will replace a second part of the hardware on the switch.
We expect a loss of the public network of servers present in the rack T05H09 during the intervention. We apologize for the inconvenience caused
The material is changed, our teams are monitoring the situation.
Rack T05H07 is reachable since 06h50 UTC.
We observe a loss of public connectivity on the T05H07 rack.

Our technical teams will proceed to an hardware replacement on switch A.
We will publish a new update once the replacement is done

Currently, the traffic is ensured by the switches B and A. However, the redundancy is not ensured if B became unreachable. Indeed, only 90% of the traffic would be provided by A.This is due to a hardware issue which is being repaired by one of our manufacturers.

Start time : 06/04/2022 07:15 UTC Service impact : After the operations carried out by our team, all the services are now operational. The switch is working as expected at this time. We will continue to monitor the situation for another 2 hours.

Start time : 06/04/2022 07:15 UTC Service impact : After the resolution of this incident Incident link, We observed problems with one of the switches that was set up to restore services. During the reload, we except some loss of services. Ongoing actions : our technical teams will proceed to its isolation, we plan to perform a reload afterwards to fix the problem.

Start time : 11/04/2022 02:00 UTC End time : 11/04/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : Interruption of the public network during maintenance for some servers will be present. Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to reload some servers and apply an update on them.

Start time : 11/04/2022 04:30 UTC End time : 11/04/2022 05:30 UTC Service impact : The servers will be unavailable during maintenance. Service improvement : We are going to restart an electrical equipment that is encountering feedback problems.

Start time : 11/04/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 11/04/2022 23:59 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management ,we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park

Start time : 12/04/2022 00:00 UTC End time : 12/04/2022 00:30 UTC Service impact : Network connectivity not available for 30 min. Service improvement : We are experiencing difficulties with a port on the network device. We will make a port change to fix the problem.

Start time : 12/04/2022 02:00 UTC End time : 12/04/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : Public network outage during maintenance for servers without LACP (Link Aggregation Control Protocol) configured Service improvement : We need to resolve interface issue or any other bug and to apply new software version

Start time : 12/04/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 12/04/2022 23:59 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management ,we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park

Start time : 13/04/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 13/04/2022 23:59 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management ,we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park

Start time : 13/04/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 13/04/2022 23:59 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management ,we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park

Start time : 21/04/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 22/04/2022 02:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of management IPs only switchs for about 3 mins Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the infrastructure

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life

incident_updates.body: Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service. OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date. Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date. --------------------------------------------------- Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service. OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date. Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.
We have just completed maintenance on the BHS datacenter. We will resume the operation on the SYD datacenter from 14:00 UTC
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 07/04/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 07/04/2022 23:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management ,we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park
